captions.text:
>>WELL, MALLORY, YOU HAVE A DIFFICULT
DECISION TO MAKE TODAY.

YOU HAVE TO SEND TWO GUYS HOME TONIGHT.
>>I KNOW CHRIS.

IT'S JUST GOING TO BE SO HARD.
I JUST FEEL LIKE I'VE MADE A REALLY DEEP

CONNECTION
WITH ALL OF THE GUYS.

>>WELL TELL ME ABOUT THE GUYS.
>>UM, WELL, YOU KNOW, THERE'S JEREMY AND

ADAM.
AND THEY'RE BOTH SO FUNNY TO ME IN DIFFERENT

WAYS.
>>IF MALLORY DOESN'T PICK ME I'M GOING

TO BE CRUSHED.
>>GOING INTO THIS ROSE CEREMONY I'M ALL

OUT OF JOKES.
AND I'M TERRIFIED.

>>AND THEN THERE'S STEPHEN AND STACEY,
AND THEY'RE BOTH REALLY SENSITIVE.

>>I JUST DON'T WANT TO WALK OUT OF HERE
TONIGHT.

I REALLY DON'T.
>>MALLORY?

SHE'S THE GIRL OF MY DREAMS YOU KNOW?
>>AND JAMES, HE'S VERY KIND AND INTELLIGENT.

>>I DIDN'T COME HERE TO GET MY HEART BROKEN,
BUT TONIGHT I'M REALLY WORRIED I MIGHT.

>>AND THEN THERE'S SNAPE.
SNAPE YEAH, HE'S SOMETHING SPECIAL.

>>I CAME ONTO THIS SHOW BECAUSE I HAVE BEEN
STUCK ON ONE

WOMAN FOR A VERY LONG TIME.
IF MALLORY SENDS ME HOME TONIGHT I SHALL BE

SEVERELY
DISAPPOINTED IN HER.

>>SNAPE IS BY FAR THE MOST MYSTERIOUS GUY
IN THE HOUSE.

SNAPE?
HEY SNAPE, MAL'S COMING UP

WITH A DATE CARD SO...
>>GET OUT!

>>I THINK HE MAKES A LOT OF SOUP....
>>HE'S NOT LIKE ANYONE I'VE EVER MET.
>>HE'S NOT LIKE ANYONE I'VE EVER MET.

HE'S REALLY PASSIONATE.
>>WHAT?

YOU'VE NEVER FINISHED A BOOK BEFORE?
>>NO, HARRY POTTER WAS JUST SO ANNOYING YOU KNOW?
OH!

I COULD LISTEN TO HIS VOICE ALL DAY.
SO PRETTY.

>>YOU ARE MY CHOCOLATE FROG.
MY BERTIE'S BOTT.

>>THAT CLOAK HE WEARS...
SO HOT YOU KNOW?

IT JUST LEAVES EVERYTHING TO THE IMAGINATION.
I'M JUST LIKE WOW.

♪♪ >>HEY SNAPE,
PUT ON YOUR SUIT AND GET IN!

>>NOT COOL.
>>I DON'T KNOW.

>>YEAH.
>>THAT'S JUST HOW I FEEL ABOUT HIM.
>>GENTLEMEN, ITS TIME FOR THE ROSE CEREMONY.
>>I JUST WANT TO SAY,

THAT FROM MY HEART, THIS IS THE HARDEST DECISION
THAT I HAVE EVER HAD TO MAKE.

>>JAMES.
>>AVADA KEDAVRA.
OH NO!

>>STACEY.
>>AVADA KEDAVRA.

>>JEREMY.
>>AVADA KEDAVRA.

>>ADAM.
>>AVADA KEDAVRA.

>>THIS IS THE FINAL ROSE. WHEN YOU'RE READY.
>>SNAPE.

SNAPE, WILL YOU ACCEPT THIS ROSE?
>>FINE, BUT WEAR THIS ALWAYS.

>>OKAY, JUST LIKE THIS?
YOU LIKE IT?

>>YES.
LET'S GO LILY.

>>IT'S MALLORY.
>>SHH. >>WHAT?
